entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
